title: Please!!! I want to know the name of this font. Help me!
author: Eleto95

comments.content:
If you need an extended example, here is one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AMAMEO_5111.jpg)

It must be **[Ellington MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162926/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Ellington%20MT%20-%20Regular&fid=044fa3477e23169697ab2b28de64e4fd&fsize=60&text=DESATAME%20EMPIEZO%20A%20RECORDARTE%20YO%20VENGO%20PANTERA&wrap=2)** by Michael Harvey [1990] probably a bit manually expanded
:OO Very wise, guy!!!! Maybe as you say, it's a bit manually expanded, but certainly is that font. Thank you sooo much! My hero! xD
